INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Moderate decrease of the concentrations of ethinylestradiol
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Another contraceptive method, in particular a barrier type, should be used.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Possible increase of the concentrations of rufinamide, especially with children who weigh less than 30 kg.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: With children who weigh less than 30 kg: do not exceed the total dose of 600mg/day after the period of titration.
